extendedInfo.description: ** Requires root **This app is designed to fix update problems that come from mismatched signatures between Superuser.apk on your phone, and Superuser.apk on the Market. If successful, this app will let you update from the market even if you've had trouble before.Special thanks to JoÃ«l Bourquard for technical help writing this, and @fitsnugly on twitter for the icon.Note: This app requires busybox. A static build of busybox is included in the app, but is only used if you do not have busybox already installed. The included version should work on most phones. If it does not work for you, please email me at the link below so we can get it working.Support request emails that simply say "Doesn't work" or something to that effect are automatically deleted by our stupidity filter and will not be answered.

reviews.comment: I love Superusers development department, they\'re witty, obviously talented!\tSUPER DUPER APPLICATION! I bet you get tired of all the \"I would rate it 5 stars if...(if I knew what I was frigin doing)\" Seriously you guys should dev all the apps in the app store.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Just get (waiting for root access) after force fix (would not have downloaded this is SU was fine) much like with Titanium Backup  some point after the SU update became useless. Using rooted HTC ChaCha (Status).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superuser Update Fixer
reviews.comment: Updated daily which is nice! Been keepin my eye open for something that will truelly be,\"A One Click Root\" 4 my evo shift 2.3.4 w/o having 2 use a pc. I always end up having 2 dl another app; a busybox couldn\'t b found on my phone, apk, sdk, su, xbin, a correctinstal path etc...I haven\'t actually been able 2 successfully root yet,but a cpl more days testing every possibility online n I\'m sure I\'ll succeed! good job on all ur other work as well btw. it\'s people like u that keep it fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does nothing for HTC Desire running 2.3.3. Had to reflash a Rom with Su 3.0

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Helped my superuser app which the market couldn\'t update before. Using a crappy old motorola flipside on cm7.2

reviews.title: Worked on Samsung Galaxy S 4G
reviews.comment: The progress bar didn\'t finish, so the UI was a bit confusing. But it did say Checking signatures... ok! so I figured it was good, and it was.

reviews.title: Corrupted superuser
reviews.comment: I selected the force option, and for a second it looked good, but then it force closed on me and then my superuser was gone. Had to reinstall from the market. Using an Inspire 4g

reviews.title: Not able to update SU on sony x8
reviews.comment: this is regarding sony x8 which i have... i tried to download your KM tamil unicode... but unfortunately i could not complete because of root permission... it keep on saying asking root permission... i could found that my SU file missing which was in my SDcard when i formatted it.. when i tried to update SU binary using superuser tool it says the below error: An error occurred and su was not updated. A zip file (SU-2.3.1-BIN-SIGNED.ZIP) has been placed on your sdcard, please reboot into recovery mode and

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says.
reviews.comment: Although I\'m glad that this exists, it scares me to think of how apps like this could be misused. I\'ll try not to be bothered with it and just be glad it works.

reviews.title: Worked
reviews.comment: Said no problems, force fixed anyway, app force closed, but problem appears gone, thanks! Droid Incredible.
